Dialogue: Oh, a visitor. I'm glad somebody is here to see me.
I haven't felt this much joy since my last voyage.
To go to the moon and see the stars with my own eyes. . . That was my dream.
I died alongside that dream when the accident occurred right in this very spot long ago.
I refuse to abandon my ship, that's why I won't leave this place.
I hope to see you again soon!
Having a friend to talk to makes me feel more alive.
What I would give to have my life back . . .
